Ephel Brandir (also called the Ephel) was a settlement of Men of Brethil in Brethil. It lay upon the hill of Amon Obel
column3: and is where TÃºrin was taken when he fell ill. It was ruled by Brandir son of Handir.

column1: Ephel Brandir is Sindarin for "the encircling fence of Brandir".
